title: n00dBuffs
description: Boost your gameplay with Spellbinding Power! Elevate your characters with buffs that enchant their abilities, from swift speed enhancements to mighty damage amplifiers. You are in control of the buff.
longDescription:
n00dBuffs: Dynamic Buff Management for Enhanced Gameplay


Demonstration 📹

Project Integration 📹

Create Modifier and Data Asset 📹

Setup UI 📹


Amplify your game's capabilities with n00dBuffs, a cutting-edge, fully network-replicated component designed to supercharge player abilities through dynamic buff management. Effortlessly integrate powerful enhancements with precise control, boosting your gameplay to new heights. This plugin operates in perfect harmony with n00dTraits, ensuring that each buff interacts seamlessly across your game's ecosystem.


Key Features:


  • Comprehensive Buff System: Employs a robust system powered by primary data assets for each buff, from health regeneration to critical hit enhancements, you are only limited by your imagination.
  • Buff Types: Supports stacked buffs, timed buffs, and refreshed timers so that you can decide how to apply the buff in various contexts
  • Advanced Modifier Class: Includes a versatile modifier class that custom handles the application of special abilities, ensuring that buffs adjust player attributes accurately and efficiently.
  • Seamless Integration with n00dTraits: Works flawlessly with the n00dTraits plugin (available soon), allowing buffs to communicate and dynamically adjust traits based on gameplay needs.
  • Network Replication: Ensures that all buffs are consistently applied and managed across all players, maintaining gameplay integrity in multiplayer settings. Client-side prediction provides instantaneous feedback to players.
  • Flexible Customization: Designed for easy customization, allowing developers to tailor buffs to fit their game's unique requirements.
  • Extensive Examples: Comes with comprehensive examples that demonstrate the plugin’s capabilities, all set up for multiplayer scenarios and easy to adapt for any project.
  • Detailed Documentation: Get started quickly and easily with documentation designed to get you buffing your character with minimal effort


Limitless Enhancement

With n00dBuffs, your game’s potential is boundless. Power up characters in inventive ways and maintain balance with precision. Each enhancement not only elevates gameplay but also enriches player experience.


Integrated with n00dWorkshop Suite

As a vital component of the n00dWorkshop suite, n00dBuffs benefits from streamlined integration with other n00d assets, reinforcing consistency and simplifying development processes across your projects.

Elevate your game’s dynamic capabilities with n00dBuffs—where every buff is a bridge to extraordinary gameplay experiences.


Ready for Any Project

n00dBuffs is designed to fit seamlessly into most projects, supporting a broad range of game types without the need for extensive custom coding.


Enhance your characters' functionality and uniqueness with n00dBuffs —the smart choice for developers aiming for top-tier character engagement.


Orbital Marketplace

technicalDetails:
YOU DO NOT NEED TO KNOW C++ TO USE THIS PLUGIN! ALL N00D PLUGINS ARE BLUEPRINT-FIRST, C++ WHERE REQUIRED!



Code Modules:

  • Runtime

 

Number of Blueprints: 5 (excluding examples)

Number of C++ Classes: 1 (Project Settings)

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux
